name: Peggy's Oven-Fried Chicken
ingredients: 1 cup finely crushed pork rinds (about 2 1/2 ounces)
2 tablespoons seasoning blend of your choice

instructions.en: Coat each piece of chicken with mayonnaise.
Mix parmesan cheese, crushed pork rinds, and seasonings in a shallow bowl.
Dip chicken pieces in the crumb mixture, coating on all sides. Place on a foil-lined, rimmed baking sheet.
Pat any remaining crumbs on top of the chicken.
Bake at 350ยบ for 60-70 minutes or until the chicken is done.

notes: Makes 4-8 servings. *The recipe creator used KFC Chicken Seasoning for the seasoning blend.
